body_html: In the original paper they use peephole connections (i.e. the gates depend on the hidden state) but as far as I can tell these connections are not present in the implementation. Is this intentional? Might be worth it do mention in the documentation in that case.
body_text: In the original  paper they use peephole connections (i.e. the gates depend on the hidden state) but as far as I can tell these connections are not present in the implementation. Is this intentional? Might be worth it do mention in the documentation in that case.
body: In the original  paper they use peephole connections (i.e. the gates depend on the hidden state) but as far as I can tell these connections are not present in the implementation. Is this intentional? Might be worth it do mention in the documentation in that case.
